name: Clone Dots
summary:
Say “Hello!” to Dolly the Sheep and her “Clone Dots”!
“Clone Dots - Color Lines Mania” is simple and addictive puzzle game for everyone!
It’s about cloning dots and making lines at least of 4 dots.
But! You also can use 4 bonuses to help you! Make more color lines with Dolly the Sheep and get clovers. Use clovers to buy bonuses. Clone color dots, collect clovers, use bonuses, set new records and compete with your friends!
